Directions: In a bowl, combine the first four ingredients.  In anther bowl, combine the oats, apricots, butter and boiling water; stir until butter is melted.  Cool for 5 minutes.  Stir in eggs, milk and orange peel if desired.  Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened.  Fill greased or paper-lined muffin cups two-thirds full.  Bake at 400 degrees F for 20-22 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.  Cool for 5 minutes before removing to wire racks.
